content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?
replace with a 2d game where a player on a bike rides on a line randomly roller coastering

function.arguments: {"component_id": "Hero1734669119", "image_input": "2D game where a player on a bike rides on a line randomly roller-coastering", "placement_instructions": "Replace existing image in Hero component with the generated game concept image", "acknowledgement_message": "Okay, I'm generating the image and adding it to the Hero component..."}
function.name: GenerateImageAndPlaceInComponent
